<Canvas>
  <Story
    name="Editable"
    height="100px"
  >
    {{
      props: {
        tabs: [1, 2, 3],
        add(num = 1) {
          this.tabs = this.tabs.concat(
            Array.from({ length: num })
              .fill()
              .map((_, i) => this.tabs[this.tabs.length - 1] + i + 1),
          )
        },
        remove(index) {
          this.tabs.splice(index, 1)
        },
      },
    }}
  </Story>
</Canvas>
